body_html:
Aside: We should take an export flag which allows automatically converting the ATen ops into ONNX ATen operators when there is not a symbolic implementation of the op for ONNX.

That way, unsupported ATen ops automatically go through the experimental path.

I believe the ATen Caffe2 op is close enough in semantics to the form we record ATen ops in t he JIT that the changes would be pretty minimal and would not require any generated code.
body_text:
Aside: We should take an export flag which allows automatically converting the ATen ops into ONNX ATen operators when there is not a symbolic implementation of the op for ONNX.
That way, unsupported ATen ops automatically go through the experimental path.
I believe the ATen Caffe2 op is close enough in semantics to the form we record ATen ops in t he JIT that the changes would be pretty minimal and would not require any generated code.
body:
Aside: We should take an export flag which allows automatically converting the ATen ops into ONNX ATen operators when there is not a symbolic implementation of the op for ONNX. 

That way, unsupported ATen ops automatically go through the experimental path.

I believe the ATen Caffe2 op is close enough in semantics to the form we record ATen ops in t he JIT that the changes would be pretty minimal and would not require any generated code.
